properties.name: Billy
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Grayson, GAIt was a rapturous courtship with Billy, my middle school boyfriend. Then one day he was shipped off to military school without anyone telling me. At the time I attributed it simply to his already-noticeable drinking and drug problem, but now I see it was just a foreshadowing of later flames who would abruptly leave town without mentioning it.

properties.name: Brian
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Atlanta, GAAfter drunkenly telling me we should move away together at a Braves game, I applied for and took a job 800 miles away. Told Brian, who I\'d been dating eight months. He didn\'t remember saying we should move. Then he just stopped returning my calls.

properties.name: Daniel
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Athens, GAHooked up with this hot guy once, and I liked him even though he had a prom candle by his bed and actually lit it. A few years later I saw him in a bar in Atlanta and wondered if he remembered me. He didn\'t.

properties.name: Josh
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410New York, NYOK, this wasn\'t actually IN New York. But this guy from my company came down from New York, and I stupidly got with him. A few days later he wrote me -- on company e-mail -- to inquire whether I had an STD. I didn\'t. But it spooked me so I got tested again anyway. Whew! All clear. Suppose I should thank him.

properties.name: Lee
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Athens, GAAnother guy I hooked up with, but only after a day of heavy boozing. 48 hours later I found out he\'d been with a friend of mine the night before coming home with me. A male friend of mine. Last I heard of Lee he was asking that same friend to snort cocaine off his nuts in a club in Atlanta.

properties.name: Matthew
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Annapolis, MDBriefly dated a guy in Annapolis, though it was pretty casual. I found out just how casual it was when I called him one time and turns out he\'d moved two hours away. Whoops!

properties.name: Scott
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Athens, GADated for a while in college, then he dumped me at my apartment senior year. Said he wasn\'t ready to get married. Then he went and married someone else.

properties.name: Tregan
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Omaha, NEMet Tregan at a bar in Atlanta, fell in love, then went to see him in Nebraska. Won him several hundred dollars at a craps table at a casino we went to. Then he dropped me off at the curb at the Omaha airport and never gave me any of the money. Never heard from him again until a few weeks later when he sent me a racist forward. I wrote back, why did you send me this? Never heard back.

properties.name: Wesley
properties.description: Posted by Kristen410Athens, GAKnown him since middle school, then stayed friends. Hooked up after college. It was bad. I called to make amends, but his mom returned the call and said he\'d moved to Germany. Whoops! Never heard from him again.
